data.title: Country - South Sudan
data.meta_description: Our statistical model estimates that there is a 0.3%, or approximately 1 in 344, chance of a new mass killing beginning in South Sudan in 2023 or 2024. South Sudan ranks 86th highest-risk among 166 co...
data.text:
Receive Updates

from the Early Warning Project and the Simon-Skjodt Center for the Prevention of Genocide

The Early Warning Project is a joint initiative of the Simon-Skjodt Center for the Prevention of Genocide of the United States Holocaust Memorial Museum, and the Dickey Center for International Understanding at Dartmouth College.
